# DFW Furniture Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Complete Next.js furniture website with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and comprehensive e-commerce functionality.

## Key Features Implemented
- ✅ Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- ✅ TypeScript for type safety
- ✅ All category pages (Bedroom, Living Room, Dining, Office, Kids, Outdoor)
- ✅ 360° product viewing with image carousels
- ✅ Product showcase with ratings and reviews
- ✅ Book demo functionality
- ✅ Mobile-responsive navigation
- ✅ Complete product collections
- ✅ Working navigation and buttons
- ✅ Updated DFW logo with circular gradient design

## Project Structure
- `src/app/` - Next.js 15 app router pages
- `src/components/` - Reusable React components
- `src/app/categories/` - Individual category pages
- `src/app/products/` - All products overview page
- `src/app/book-demo/` - Demo booking functionality

## Development Status
Project is fully functional with all navigation working, category pages complete, and 360° viewing implemented across all products.
